item.title: Orion Context Broker
item.description: The FIWARE ecosystem # There is vast chaos of available software technologies regarding possible approaches to a Digital Twin implementation. I am a complete newbie in the area, having a background in computer science and IT implementations in NTUA. It is a fortunate coincidence that I can capitalize on my experience and immediately utilize the plethora of excellent available tools and practices, most notably the FIWARE ecosystem. The heart of any Digital Twin implementation is a system for managing context information.
